Heading: Number of siblings
Value: 3rd of 3 older brothers; One of which was a  half-brother (Natividad and Felix)

Heading: Family event
Value: Younger half-brother Natividad killed a man in his café.

Heading: Head injury?
Value: Unknown. Possible abnormalities stemming from shock therapy.

Heading: Applied for job as a cop?
Types of jobs worked
Value: Migrant farm worker who worked his way up through the ranks

Heading: Employment status during series
Value: Employed as a labor contractor providing area ranchers with cheap labor.

Heading: Victim type
Value: Elderly alcoholics, social drop outs, and other misfits who worked as ranch-hands

Heading: Method of killing
Value: Stabbed in the chest and hacked about the back of the head.

Heading: Killing occurred in home of victim?
Killing occurred in home of killer?
Weapon
Value: Machete, knife the serial killer brought with him

Heading: Used blindfold?
Value: Some victim’s faces were covered by their shirts.

Heading: Posed the body?
Value: Their shirts were pulled up over their face and arms and pants were either pulled down or they were pant less.

Heading: Moved, buried
Value: Buried on neighboring farms near workplace/homeplace

Heading: Sentence
Value: 25 life sentences with chance of parole

Heading: Killer killed in prison?
Value: No. Killer was assaulted in prison.
